Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Wakeforest Drive, west of the Tranquility Patrol.
Room.LongDescription: The Tranquility Patrol Station is located on the east side of the road and provides assistance in keeping the peace in Oceancrest. These domestic guards patrol the streets of Oceancrest, cleaning up crime where ever they can. Unfortunately, the Tranquility Patrol is rather small and cannot handle much of the action which can take place in a city as large as Oceancrest.
